timeline.title: Looking for new oppertunities
timeline.description: Expecting to graduate in May 2018 and started exploring new oppertunities. Please contact me using the details mentioned on the home page if you are looking for a software developer.

timeline.title: Created this website
timeline.description: This website is created using Angular 4, Typescript, Boostrap and Node.js. All the interface components are designed and developed by myself and the source code is available at github. The idea of building this website is to use it for any individual. Hence it is created to read the data from a json file and dynamically render on the page.

timeline.title: Started working as Graduate Research Assistant under Dr. Boicu
timeline.description: Started working on web application design and development using emerging technologies including Angular 2, Typescript, Bootstrap, HTML and CSS. Also, started applying all my experience using agile and became the scrum master to manage sprint plans and daily stand up meetings. Learned a lot of stuff about user experience, javascript and html features, developed for mobile and iPad like devices etc.

timeline.title: Volunteered as Graduate Research Assistant
timeline.description: Got in contact with Dr. Gingold in Computer Science department and voluntarily started working on a project using javascript, HTML canvas and nodejs.

timeline.title: First day at George Mason University
timeline.description: Explored the university, met new people and found exciting new room-mates to share the apartment.

timeline.title: Landed in United States
timeline.description: For the first time I came to the United States and landed at Washington Dulles International Airport. Very excited to explore and also nervous and emotional since I had left my family behind.

timeline.title: Left General Electric
timeline.description: The decision to pursue masters from GMU, left with no other option but to leave GE and move on. I'm very grateful for working with such a large orgnanization and could learn technical and leadership skills at their best level.

timeline.title: Got Admit in George Mason University
timeline.description: Post graduation was one of the remaining spot in my life hence decided to pursue my Masters in Software Engineering from George Mason University.

timeline.title: Promoted to Lead Engineer
timeline.description: This was the time when I took responsibility of a project that was running late and contributed to the successful delivery of the first production version. I learned a lot from this project by greater involvement in gathering functional requirements, following agile, creating stories, managing sprint plans, daily standup meetings, architecture discussions, code reviews and production ready reviews.

timeline.title: Started working on Web Application Development
timeline.description: This was the first time when I started to work on we based applications using Java in on server side and javascript, html and css for front end development. This was a large project to integrate over 200 design tools to be a part of the single system for better handoffs with improved communication and data transfer. I had attended two weeks professional training to learn Java and related technologies including Spring framework, Hibernate and JPA. After a few weeks I really sppeded up with all the technologies and started developing major features that had a real good impact on the overall development.

timeline.title: Joined Advance Design Tools Team
timeline.description: ADT is one of the software development team in GE Avaiation. I was assigned to work on a small project with NX customization and C++ technologies.

timeline.title: Started working at General Electric
timeline.description: The name has a lot of oppertunities in itslef to grow up professionally in an environment where great people work togather to make an imapct. It was a sunny day and the time for induction (OMG! Too much to digest in inductions).

timeline.title: Left job at Geometric Limited
timeline.description: Thriving for new role and challenges with more user interactions led me to change of job. This was an emotional time and it is a team that I always remember with gratitude.

timeline.title: Promoted to be the owner of DFMPro for NX
timeline.description: DFMPro for NX was emerging and my practical learnings of NX Customizations and applying them for the product improvements helped me to achieve this role and take responsibility of becoming the owner of a part of the DFMPro.

timeline.title: Started working on DFMPro product development
timeline.description: DFMPro is the customized CAD based product of geometric which provides insights to CAD designs for early identification of problems to reduce cost and improve efficiency. Here I learned by practially working with C++, MFC and computational geometry. Also, learned some new technologies and tools including JIRA, SVN, Visual Studio, QuickBuild, Wix and SQL.

timeline.title: Started working at Geometric Limited as Software Engineer
timeline.description: Got my first job at Geometric Limited as a Software Engineer. This was my first step into software engineering world and it was very exciting! I enjoyed the first two months learning object oriented programming languages including C++ and C# with MFC for GUI design and development. I also learned computational geometry with one of the best trainer at Geomertic.

timeline.title: Graduated with a degree in B.Tech.
timeline.description: Completed four years and successfully recieved a degree in Mechanical Engineering from Government College of Engineering, Amravati.

timeline.title: Started College at GCOEA
timeline.description: Got admit and started college at Government College of Engineering, Amravati, India. Here I studied for four years and enjoyed bachelors life as much as I can. :)
